changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Create injectable_definitions table - the universe of variables

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: FK to workspaces - nullable for global scope

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Unique key per scope (workspace or global)
changeSet.sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_injectable_definitions_unique_key ON content.injectable_definitions (COALESCE(workspace_id, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'::uuid), key);

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Trigger to auto-update updated_at on modification
changeSet.rollback: DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_injectable_definitions_updated_at ON content.injectable_definitions;

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Source type: INTERNAL (system-calculated) or EXTERNAL (from external source)

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Flexible JSONB metadata for configuration options (formats, etc.)

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Global system injectables for date/time - available to all workspaces
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO content.injectable_definitions (workspace_id, key, label, description, data_type, source_type, metadata) VALUES (NULL, 'date_time_now', 'Fecha y Hora Actual', 'Fecha y hora al momento de generar el documento', 'TEXT', 'INTERNAL', '{"options": {"formats": ["DD/MM/YYYY HH:mm", "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss", "long"], "default": "DD/MM/YYYY HH:mm"}}'), (NULL, 'date_now', 'Fecha Actual', 'Fecha al momento de generar el documento', 'DATE', 'INTERNAL', '{"options": {"formats": ["DD/MM/YYYY", "MM/DD/YYYY", "YYYY-MM-DD", "long"], "default": "DD/MM/YYYY"}}'), (NULL, 'time_now', 'Hora Actual', 'Hora al momento de generar el documento', 'TEXT', 'INTERNAL', '{"options": {"formats": ["HH:mm", "HH:mm:ss", "hh:mm a"], "default": "HH:mm"}}'), (NULL, 'year_now', 'Año Actual', 'Año al momento de generar el documento', 'NUMBER', 'INTERNAL', '{}'), (NULL, 'month_now', 'Mes Actual', 'Mes al momento de generar el documento', 'TEXT', 'INTERNAL', '{"options": {"formats": ["number", "name", "short_name"], "default": "number"}}'), (NULL, 'day_now', 'Día Actual', 'Día del mes al momento de generar el documento', 'NUMBER', 'INTERNAL', '{}');

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Dedicated column for format configuration (default format and available options)

changeSet.author: doc-assembly
changeSet.comment: Validate format_config structure: must be NULL, empty object, OR contain 'default' (string) and 'options' (array)
changeSet.rollback: ALTER TABLE content.injectable_definitions DROP CONSTRAINT chk_format_config_structure;
